introText.title: The simplest invoice and instalment purchase in Germany.
introText.text: We are delighted that you have decided in favour of easyCredit, the perfect payment method for your online shop.

introLinks.title: Do you have any questions? We are here to help.
introLinks.text: We are here for you from Monday to Friday from 8:00 to 18:00.

introBill.title: easyCredit-Rechnung - the ideal addition to instalment purchase
introBill.text: With easyCredit, you can now offer your customers the option of invoice purchase in addition to the classic instalment purchase. The payment term is 30 days in the future.

clickAndCollect.introText:
You want to use Click&Collect for easyCredit? Nothing could be simpler! To be able to use the feature, you need an additional supplementary agreement to your factoring contract. To do so, simply contact your key account manager or ask him via our Click&Collect form.

It is important for you that when using Click&Collect you must ensure that the purchased product is handed over exclusively to the contractual partner. The responsibility for the correct handover lies with you as the merchant.

Please set the shipping method with which you offer Click&Collect in the following:

capture.label: Report delivery automatically?
capture.helpText: If this option is set, the delivery is automatically reported to easyCredit when the status of the delivery changes to "Shipped".

refund.label: Refund transactions automatically?
refund.helpText: If this option is set, the refund is automatically reported to easyCredit when the status of the delivery changes to "Returned".

transactionHandling.note: To define the transaction status, the actions "Report delivery" and "Refund" are available in Flow Builder. You can configure the actions flexibly and thus adapt them optimally to your order processing.

overview.title: Overview
overview.introText: We provide you with a range of marketing components that you can easily activate in your online shop. In this way, you achieve an optimal presentation of payment via easyCredit, for higher sales and satisfied customers.

express.title: Express Button
express.introText: The Express button can be displayed on the product detail page and in the shopping cart. It allows customers to buy the product or shopping cart without detours through the ordering process.

fieldsActivate.title: Express-Button
fieldsActivate.expressProductLabel: Show express button on detail page
fieldsActivate.expressCartLabel: Show express button in shopping cart

widget.title: Widget
widget.introText: The widget component is shown on the product detail page and in the shopping cart. It calculates the lowest possible rate with which a product with a certain price can be financed. Clicking on "more info" opens the rate calculator with further details on financing. If the product price is outside the possible financing amounts, the widget indicates the minimum or maximum possible financing amount.

selectorProduct.label: CSS selector for product detail page

selectorProductListing.label: CSS selector for product listing page

selectorOffCanvasCart.label: CSS selector for off canvas cart

modal.title: Modal
modal.introText: The modal component can be used to actively draw the customer's attention to the instalment purchase in the shop. A time-controlled display of the modal is possible. If the customer closes the modal, the component remembers this and prevents it from being displayed again.

fieldsActivate.title: Activate modal
fieldsActivate.showLabel: Automatically show modal on first visit to the online shop

fieldsSettings.title: Settings
fieldsSettings.delayHelpText: Here you can specify in milliseconds the delay after which the modal is displayed to the customer when the page is loaded (for example "10000" for 10 seconds delay).
fieldsSettings.reactivationHelpText: Here you can specify in seconds the time after which the modal is displayed again to the customer (when the page is loaded) after he has actively closed the modal (for example "3600" for 1 hour).
fieldsSettings.mediaLabel: Replace default image with your own image
fieldsSettings.mediaHelpText: To set an image per sales channel, please do not choose an image on the global level.

card.title: Card
card.introText: The card component can be used to replace a product within the product list with a banner to advertise the hire purchase. The banner shows a standard image that can be overwritten. This allows you to use an image that matches your product offering.

fieldsSettings.title: Settings
fieldsSettings.mediaLabel: Replace default image with your own image
fieldsSettings.mediaHelpText: To set an image per sales channel, please do not choose an image on the global level.

flashbox.title: Flashbox
flashbox.introText: This marketing component allows a banner to be displayed at the bottom of the screen to advertise hire purchase. The banner shows a standard image that can be overwritten. This allows you to use an image that matches your product offer.

fieldsActivate.title: Activate Flashbox
fieldsActivate.showLabel: Show flashbox at the bottom of the screen

fieldsSettings.title: Settings
fieldsSettings.mediaLabel: Replace default image with your own image
fieldsSettings.mediaHelpText: To set an image per sales channel, please do not choose an image on the global level.

bar.title: Bar
bar.introText: The bar component can be displayed at the top of the screen and promotes the hire purchase with short slogans. The slogans are predefined and cannot be customised.

fieldsActivate.title: Activate bar
fieldsActivate.showLabel: Show bar at the top of the screen
